description:
Your task is to control a high-tech drone and overcome challenging tracks filled with dangerous obstacles and unexpected surprises.

In each level you will encounter treacherous turns, narrow corridors, moving objects and other challenges that require extreme concentration and instant reaction. Control the drone with the precision of a surgeon to avoid collisions and successfully complete the route.

Stunning graphics and realistic flight physics create an immersive experience, making you feel like a real pilot. Additionally, the game includes timed modes where you compete against yourself and other players to achieve the best score in each level, and a challenge mode that offers unique skill and dexterity challenges.

GAME FEATURES:
• Real training of reaction and attentiveness
• Lots of levels with dangerous obstacles
• Detailed and realistic physics
name: Drone Pilot: Extreme Flight Simulator
